metadata.description: Not used, but needed to pass arm-ttk test `Location-Should-Not-Be-Hardcoded`.  We instead use the `workspace-location` which is derived from the LA workspace

body.message:
Associated WHOIS record for @{items('For_each_host')?['HostName']}.@{items('For_each_host')?['DnsDomain']}:

Registrar: @{body('Get_WHOIS')?['registrar']}
Registered:@{body('Get_WHOIS')?['registered']}
Expires: @{body('Get_WHOIS')?['expiresAt']}
Contact: @{body('Get_WHOIS')?['contactEmail']}
Nameservers: @{body('Get_WHOIS')?['nameServers']}

To search on WHOIS data or view historic records, see https://community.riskiq.com/search/@{items('For_each_host')?['HostName']}.@{items('For_each_host')?['DnsDomain']}/whois

Associated WHOIS record for @{items('For_each_ip')?['Address']}:

Registrar: @{body('Get_WHOIS_IP')?['registrar']}
Registered:@{body('Get_WHOIS_IP')?['registered']}

Contact: @{body('Get_WHOIS_IP')?['contactEmail']}
Nameservers: @{body('Get_WHOIS_IP')?['nameServers']}

To search on WHOIS data or view historic records, see https://community.riskiq.com/search/@{items('For_each_ip')?['Address']}/whois
